title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain.
In a skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta and garlic in the skillet. Remove from heat.
Quickly add the egg mixture, stirring to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water as needed to adjust consistency.
Serve immediately, garnished with parsley

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: A popular Indian curry dish featuring marinated grilled chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion until translucent. Add garlic and ginger; cook for 2 minutes.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro before serving.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: An assortment of sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
ingredients: Assorted fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado, crab, smoked salmon)
instructions: Rinse sushi rice under cold water until water runs clear. Cook rice with water in a rice cooker or pot.
In a small saucepan, heat vinegar, sugar, and salt until dissolved. Mix with cooked rice.
Spread rice on a bamboo mat covered with plastic wrap. Place a nori sheet on top.
Add fillings of choice in a line and roll tightly.
Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
Cooked rice or noodles, for serving
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger; stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and stir to combine.
Serve over rice or noodles, garnished with sesame seeds.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: In a skillet, cook onion until soft. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add ground beef and taco seasoning. Cook until browned.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill shells with beef mixture and top with desired toppings.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Beat on medium for 2 minutes. Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour batter into prepared pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Let cakes cool before frosting as desired.
